apps.name: snapchat iota
apps.versionDescription: [ status: ⚠️ ] - you can use the tweak all its features are working, but as of currently, using this version will get your snapchat account locked whenever snap inc. decides to launch a ban wave.as soon as you log in to the account using the tweak your account will be flagged. please use an alt account or similar before launching this tweak!
apps.localizedDescription: snapchat iota is arguably the best tweak for snapchat to date. with a ton of great features and the great devs that are putting hard work behind the scenes to get everything up and running all the time, snapchat iota is definetly a great investment for your app library.
